channel.title: Karil's Bow prob
channel.description: Hey everyone, my karils bow seems to have a slight problem. I'm using the PwnScapee source and Client. I equip everything including the racks. It seems to work fine but when I fire it it doesn't hit/ So my guy would be standing there firing it but it wouldn't hit. Anybody know how to fix this? If you need a certain code to help me fix this just ask, since there are several things that include karils bow I couldn't include the codes[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2009, 03:09:34 pm[/size][hr]HELP?

item.title: Karil's Bow prob
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Hey everyone, my karils bow seems to have a slight problem. I’m using the PwnScapee source and Client.
I equip everything including the racks. It seems to work fine but when I fire it it doesn’t hit/ So my guy would be standing there firing it but it wouldn’t hit.
Anybody know how to fix this?
If you need a certain code to help me fix this just ask, since there are several things that include karils bow I couldn’t include the codes[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2009, 03:09:34 pm[/size][hr]HELP?

Read full topic
